name: Coatzingo
address: 79-11 Roosevelt Ave, Jackson Heights, NY 11372, USA

reviews.text: Omg this place is so good
Autentica comida mexicana deliciosa

I completely got confused with this place because there‚Äôs like 3 places in these 3 blocks close to each other. This place is not up my alley, nor is is it horrible. However, got shrimp tacos- shrimp tasted so bad, got guacamole on the side and it was all brown and old, their birria is okay. Honestly the Coatzingo on 76th st is 10 times better ! The staff was very nice here but unfortunately that‚Äôs not gonna cut it !
Extent service
La comida muy deliciosa, ambiente tranquilo y buen servicio, es limpio. La verdad recomendado 100% la sopa de res blanca la recomiendo.
Very good
Great food and service, great and cheap cocktails, food portions are big, specially soups, Definitely coming back
I really liked it! The service was great and the food was delicious. I only gave it four stars because it was not very hot or warm when it came to us but the flavor was there.
jamas regreso antes cocinaban mejor hoy los chilaquiles son un asco

El d√≠a s√°bado fuimos a comer con mi familia y le pedimos a mi hijo de 4 a√±os arroz y frijoles y desde ese d√≠a a las 9 de la noche mi hijo a estado super enfermo lo lleve al hospital y me dijeron que se intoxico por una comida que estaba da√±ana jamas volveremos a ir a ese lugar por que no sabemos en que estado esta la comida que nos est√°n vendiendo. Tengan mucho cuidado a donde entran a comer

Nunca hab√≠a comido ah√≠ pero ayer le ped√≠ a mi hijo una orden de arroz y frijoles y ol√≠a como at√∫n ya estaba hechado a perder y le agarro una diarrea muy fea a mi y a mi hijo k es un beb√© de 4 a√±os no vuelvo ir ah√≠
I ordered by mistake thinking it was the restaurant three blocks away but it was a good mistake we loved the chicken tortas, will make the same mistake again üòÄ
Good
Me encanta mucho

Update:

Star Upgrade from 1 Star to 3

Revisited the location on two different occasions for my taco fix and there were significant improvements in the cleanliness standards both front and back station visual to the customer. The restaurant was clean, the fridge was fully stocked and properly merchandized, the cut vegetables accompaniments were fresh and very tasty.

In the visual BOH‚Äîthe grill was very clean and organized. The chefs had a proper flow of production to execute orders and there was no chaos (it usually never is because these guys are the best).

What I did not see were sanitation buckets (red and green) although they could on the wipe system where they're single use

‚Ä¶and the improper use of a Red Board. In this place they could be on a Red (Raw Meat), Green (fruit and veg) , White (cooked foods and breads). One the Prep is complete there should be a white board on the line to prevent any cross contamination (or the perception thereof).

‚Ä¶and for the love of People please install a time sensored air freshener in the restroom. When you walk past the restroom to the seats the smell of someone else‚Äôs business is very off putting.

Chef Duqueroix Letter Grade: B
(Presence of food consumed on the service line)

Patron: you should eat here with the following in mind:

Ambiance: beautiful and cultural.

This is a traditional Mexican restaurant where the food is good but could have a few areas of improvement. This visit was taco week and while the tacos I received were tasty the shells were served greasy and the plate was not clean.

Serving a dirty plate is disrespectful because it gives the perception that the cook does not care about the quality of the product nor the presentation.

Why the one star? This is one of my favorite restaurants and in my university days I‚Äôve eaten here to literally save my life. It‚Äôs one of the best Mexican Restaurants in Jackson Heights, 13 years ago, but it seems that the quality has declined over the years. Back in the day they paid attention to detail‚Äîthe meals were served flawlessly.

Now on a small scale commercial note I believe they should bottle their Red and Green Sauces because it‚Äôs the best any Mexican Restaurant has to offer, to be sold onsite of course, as Jackson Heights souvenirs.

If they get back to basic standards of presentation and taste‚Äîand bring back the previous charm‚ÄîPlease STOP eating food on open view of patrons (behind the line and on the FOH bar) it‚Äôs not a good look and it‚Äôs against the law. For this reason alone is why I rated one of my favorite Mexican restaurants a one star because norovirus is deadly and bare hand contact with ready to eat food is not cool.

The truth is that the food leaves a lot to be desired, even though I ordered 2 tacos I couldn't finish them because of the bad taste. They put guacamole on top of the tacos and they never offer you the spicy sauce.  Definitely not a place I would return to.  the tortilla was already destroyed.

Whenever I want to eat Mexican food this is my to-go spot, I have been a loyal customer since 2019, I think the ambiance is family friendly and I honestly love coming here for freshness, value & service. The restaurant has made improvements with space, organization and decor through out these past years.
Their shrimp tacos are to die for including all other tacos but shrimp are my favorite; so fresh so tasty so juicy. Their tortas are also really good, sopa de mariscos my personal favorite (very spicy) by the way but so authentic and it can feed two people; I usually order this soup for me and my husband and we each serve a big plate, fajitas, green mole chicken, chicken tostadas basically all of their food is always so delicious and not once I have been disappointed.
They also offer chips and homemade salsa which I absolutely love and If you feel like having a Mexican michelada go for it, all the waitresses & waiters are always friendly and work with great attitudes so I always feel welcomed, so my recommendation goes to anyone looking to eat authentic Mexican food with awesome taste, big portions and reasonable prices.

Terrible experience at the bar.
The ‚Äúbartender‚Äù was rude and unprofessional, working with earbuds and on call, all while taking orders. While I was asking about the options on the menu, she seemed very annoyed and bothered since I was ‚Äúinterrupting‚Äù her call.

I ordered takeout and when I went to the lady at the register she was a rude bitter lady.The lady with black glasses with a white hair clip  WHO HAD HER EARPHONES ON expected to hear me. She was nasty, had a whole attitude and it  completely unprofessional. Unfortunately a nasty attitude tends to make an impact on the food.
Las flautas üòç

I love their atmosphere! Service is quick and easy to order! I ordered spicy pork with beans, rice and cheese and it was delicious! Really affordable too ! Highly recommend stopping by here! One of the best Mexican restaurants in Jackson Heights!
Buen ambiente y servicio con buena comida muy recomendado
Muy buena comida mexicana
The tamales are sooo good
Have to do your homework ppl
Excelente lugar. Servicio maravilloso.
The food and atmosphere is great here. I think it's a little bit pricey. $20 meals for Mexican is a lot

Muy buen servicio y excelente calidad de la comida.
Los tacos un excelente sabor al estilo M√©xicano, una experiencia comer ah√≠ un cachito de M√©xico en NY
Yes by far my best Mexican restaurant in NY.
En lo personal depende de loque ordenes  para mi esta miy bien el servicio esta p√©simo con excepci√≥n  cuando te llevan la comida fr√≠a es porque no est√°n atentos Ho mo son eficiente

Had fantastic time at this restaurant, food was very delicious. Only thing missing at restaurant was free Wi-Fi.
La comida es muy rica la mejor torta cubana que me he comido. Son mi primera opci√≥n cuando quiero comer comida mexicana.! üôåüèΩ‚Ä¶

I used to like this restaurant, but today I ordered a delivery and after checking the taco toppings (radishes, onions, limes) I realized that they were rotten and my main dish "pork ribs in green salsa with verdolagas" was extremely spicy! I am mexican and I am a  professional cook too,  I know when food it's not right so I called them and after explaining everything the lady/ waitress just told me " the taco toppings are edibles and your food is not spicy at all, you are maybe spicy intolerant " that answer is not what I was expecting at all, basically she called me crazy! She didn't apologize or accept that the food was wrong and for me  that answer is completely unprofessional.  I don't recommend this place at all,after all I ask her if she was going to do something about it or I will not order again and she was mean to me she said, "do whatever you want." I am so disappointed,  I spent $66.00 plus tip on a dinner that wasn't edible at all. Please do yourself a favor and don't order from them.

I am Mexican , so it‚Äôs hard to find a real good spot where it taste from back home & this spot right here hits just like the mother land . I ordered a Coctel de Camaron and it‚Äôs by far the best one I‚Äôve had in Queens ü§ûüèºü§ûüèº I‚Äôve spent new years in this place and Christmas. Always my favorite spot to eat Mexican food ü´∂üèº‚ù§Ô∏èü§çüíö
Authentic and delicious food.

Try their nachos tejanos with bistec and chorizo, thank me later.
Also the carnitas platter If you are not into nachos, thank me twice.

This is by far the worst Mexican food I‚Äôd ever had!
Got my order completely wrong & found hair on my food smh! Please avoid this spot!
Excelente servicio al cliente

Didn‚Äôt know entree food portion would be that huge. Couldn‚Äôt finish it so had to pack for home. As for the taste wise it was ok I would say. I asked for spicy & it actually turned out spicy. Taco was good, quite big. Always love the tamarind juice. Very Mexican setting & the waitress was nice & friendly.
The food it‚Äôs good, the only problem they have to keep the restroom clean & with paper to dry your hands

I heard about this place, but was unprepared for how delicious the tacos were. I got Carne Asada (beef), Cecina (salty beef) and Camaron (shrimp). The meat was juicy and flavorful. Great service as well

Authentic and delicious Mexican food. You can‚Äôt go wrong with anything ordered here. Service is friendly and place is clean. Will definitely be coming back more often. Order the pozole or the barbacoa.
Trato amable muy buen ambiente y precios razonables

The food was good for the price. The beef in the tacos was just a little dry for me but overall the taste was good. We also got the  enchiladas with the rice and beans. The portion was big and the price was reasonable. They have a vast menu‚Ä¶

No soy de dar reviews , pero la comida est√° p√©sima. Gastamos casi $70.00 d√≥lares , pedimos tostadas de camar√≥n, una mojarra, y unas salchipapas , las papas todas negras , todo terrible. excelente comida mexicana, yo que no soy mexicano puedes pedir con o sin picante, buenas raciones.

We ordered several tacos. The carne asada was a bit tough and gristly. The carnitas was good although we only got 1 that we ordered of 2. Service was slow. Nachos were minimal - a couple of chips covered in cheese and a little guac in the center. There are other places in the area that are better.

La verdad me decepcione hoy de los tacos al pastor y los tacos de tripa, antes estaban mas deliciosos, no se que paso despues de que volvieron de la renovacion del local. Y pensaba llevar a toda la familia desde el bronx, espero y mejoren pronto. Ire otro dia para ver si ya mejoraron.
This is one of my absolute favorite Authentic Mexican restaurants in not just Queens, but NYC! Everything is amazing, and the staff is really nice. The prices are also very affordable!
Gets two stars only because the waiters were nice. Unfortunately our food was flavorless the salsas for the tacos was not good had no spiciness and only tasted like tomatillos.
Por que la comida no tiene el suficiente picante como debe de ser? Aparte no creo que sea nada saludable comer en la parte de atras con ese moho del techo.‚Ä¶

The food is exellent. Eat there many times. Love their Tostadas de Chicken. I never try their delivery service and don't know until what time they deliver. Muy buena la comida y creo que los deliveries son hasta sierta hora. No creo que los deliveries son 24hrs.

Ped√≠ 4 tacos y todos me los sirvieron fr√≠os los de cesina eran bistec no cecina el de alpastor era carne enchilada y luego solo me dieron una tortilla y cuando les dije el error se molestaron la salsa toda cruda fea no lo recomiendo

Amazing food. We went to try the salted beef cemina and got what I think was an al pastor enchilada platter or something like that. Everything was amazing, big portions, extremely filling, and great service. The al pastor was my favorite part.

El Sabado 19 de Marzo fui a comer con mi familia a este restaurante. Fue una muy mala experiecia por que nos dieron tacos de cabeza la cual ya no servia. Casi me dan ganas de bomitar! La mesera nos dijo que no podia cambiar los tacos ni‚Ä¶

The fresh pineapple water has no flavor and the huarache meat has not even salt or pepper not to mention the dishes are same or more expensive than Manhattan, i will look for other place because the AC was like a fan, very hot inside for that prices, no way.

The food was excellent./ la comida era deliciosa.
The men's room was filthy. There was no toilet paper./ El bano de Hombres estaba sucio. No habia papel higienco.  10/30/2021 @ 8:00 pm

Yo fui a comer aqui una sola ves y yano volvi  la comida muy rica de eso no hay duda pero El servicio que  me dio una mesera la verdad deja mucho que pedir La morra  ami casi en todo me ignoro solo atend√≠a amable ami amigo   yo le ped√≠a algo y solo desia ok ahorita  te lo traigo  y no fuera √©l pendejo de mi amigo xk de una le llevaba loque pedia y yo le desia y lo mio y la mensa desia disculpa ya voy x El la verdad se paso. Desde que llegamos la trate de buena manera   pero  en fin nose porque  hacen eso  deber√≠an atender alas personas x igual y esa morra solo atend√≠a bien alos morros xk no solo en mi mesa Se mostro hamable   asta con la mesa de alado ü§îü§îüòíüòíüòíüòí El due√±o deveria de llamarle la atenci√≥n asu personal que sea asi talves lo aran xk les dejan mas propina site portas como esa chaba en fin p√©simo servicio üëéüèªüëéüèªüëéüèª y agradescan que le di 3 estrellas
